captions.text:
I mean like, I'm here
super early so I'll just

- So my niece has to be
asleep in a dark room with

two sound machines, or else--
- [Quinta] Mhmm.

- Oh I'll just finish this
story when you're done,
- Sure, just pay me back this time.
- Allison, I always pay you back.
- Did you get a chance to read my notes?
Okay, so what do you want to eat today?
- I'll do what ever you want.

- What am I supposed to say?
- Tell him not to.

- Are you mad at me?
- No.

- Hey, are you mad at me?
- No.

- We'll get rid of Spiderman.
- Are you mad at me?
- No, Allison, are you mad at me?
I mean you owe me 20 dollars but...
You can give it to me anytime,

like through Venmo or
Paypal, I'll accept a check.
Come on, Quinta, don't be mad at me!
This is why I should never say anything.
It blows up in my face.

title: Signs You’re The Passive Aggressive Friend

comments.text:
please don't be too proud of being passive aggressive. I'm trying to stop 
because it's what I least about myself. If you have something to say, be 
straightforward or don't say it at all. You can drop hints if it's harmless 
like your interest in someone or a joke, but don't roll your eyes, or 
obviously imply something rude and not say it. Because that's basically 
saying "I'm not going to own my rudeness, but use it in a way that you get 
the point but I'm still a good person"﻿
